roles.name: Duck (Impostor)
roles.description: Work together with other Ducks to disguise yourselves as Geese and eliminate them.

roles.name: Goose (Crewmate)
roles.description: Complete tasks to finish a round before the Ducks eliminate your fellow geese.

roles.name: Bounty Goose
roles.description: Provides rewards if this goose is eliminated first.

roles.name: Mechanic Goose
roles.description: The only type of Goose that can use vents.

roles.name: Vigilante Goose
roles.description: The only type of Goose that can execute other players.

roles.name: Technician Goose
roles.description: The only type of goose that can detect sabotages.

roles.name: Medium Goose
roles.description: A Goose that can see the ghosts of eliminated Geese.

roles.name: Canadian Goose
roles.description: Anyone that kills a Canadian Goose automatically self-reports.

roles.name: Sheriff Goose
roles.description: A Goose that can kill anyone except Geese.

roles.name: Lover Goose
roles.description: Has a bond in life with another bird.

roles.name: Cannibal Duck
roles.description: A Duck that can eat corpses.

roles.name: Silencer Duck
roles.description: A Duck that can mute Geese.

roles.name: Morphling Duck
roles.description: A Duck that can impersonate other players.

roles.name: Lover Duck
roles.description: Has a bond in life with another bird.

roles.name: Vulture
roles.description: Eat corpses of murdered geese to win.

roles.name: Dodo Bird
roles.description: Act suspicious or useless enough to make other players vote you out to win.
